education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: Developed an AI-based zero-day vulnerability detection system with two main modules that focus on static code analysis and behavior analysis respectively. The first module performs static code analysis on Java and Js codebases with a custom-trained LLM to detect security flaws. The second module analyzes user behavior to detect vulnerabilities missed by code analysis, using LLM for feature extraction and a deep neural network for anomaly detection.

projects.name: ELSA: Emotional Support Chatbot
projects.description: Designed a multimodal AI chatbot supporting 3 input modes, integrated Google Speech-to-Text, RAG, FAISS pipeline, and Groq LLM API for empathetic replies.

projects.name: DefenceX
projects.description: AI tool to detect scam calls by fine-tuning DistilBERT on call transcripts. Integrated Gemini API with prompt engineering to explain results in simple terms.

projects.name: LegalLens
projects.description: AI tool that summarizes legal documents and supports multilingual search. Used a Locally hosted LLaMA-based model to deliver concise summaries and PyMuPDF to handle scanned PDFs and legal text.

extracurricular.title: Marketing Head
extracurricular.description: Led logistics and PR for a 12-hour hackathon.
